item.title: WinDuct® - Leader In Quality Fire Rated Duct

item.title: WinDuct® - Passive Fire Protection Company
item.description: Passive Fire Protection was founded in 1996 by its Executive Director and group of experts together with retired fire service officer. With the idea of developing a more affordable product that can reduce and possibly eliminate weaknesses of conventional fire systems, WinDuct® was developed.

item.title: WinDuct® - Why Choose Us
item.description: Passive Fire Protection was founded in 1996 by its Executive Director and group of experts together with retired fire service officer. With the idea of developing a more affordable product that can reduce and possibly eliminate weaknesses of conventional fire systems, WinDuct® was developed.

item.title: WinDuct® - 2 Hours Fire Rated Ductwork With Quality Assurance
item.description: Afer the installation of the WinDuct® system, representative of Passive Fire Protection Sdn Bhd and clients will conduct the completed fire rated ductwork inspection, in respect of G.I. Ductwork conformity and coating thickness are within the recommended values.

item.title: WinDuct® - Overview About 2 Hours Fire-Rated Smoke Extraction Ductwork System
item.description: A fire rated ductwork system is designed to convey smoke, hot gases and flame from area to area, and to supply air combustion in the fire area. For this purpose and reason, it is essential to provide fire protection of a duct system to life safety and of course the protection of building and property.

item.title: WinDuct® - About Intumescent Coating, coating that protects the initial material
item.description: Intumescent coating is a coating that protects the initial material by reacting to the heat exposure in a predictable, controllable manner. It reacts by swelling controllably to many times of its original thickness producing carbonaceous char or foam which acts as the insulating layer for the substrate.

item.title: WinDuct® - Specification of Fire Rated Duct
item.description: The fire rated ductwork specified should be tested to B.S. 476 Part 24 (Duct A & Duct B) and Australia Standard A.S. 1530.4 (Duct A & Duct B) as mentioned in UBBL 1984 and A.S. 1668.1998 for 120 minutes (2-Hours) stability, integrity and insulation respectively.

item.title: WinDuct® - 2 Hours Rated-Duct details
item.description: 2 Hours Fire Rated – Stability, Integrity and Insulation in accordance to BS 476 Pt 24:1987, ISO 6944:1985 and A.S.1530.4 for Duct B (Internal Fire)

item.title: WinDuct® - Before & After Test on BS476.PT24 (ISO 6944)
WinDuct® - Ductwork System That Are Tested And Complied
item.description: WinDuct® are tested and complied with Laboratory from C.S.I.R.O Australia, Laboratory from BRANZ, New Zealand, Labotratory from Warrington Fire Research, Laboratory from International Fire Consultants Ltd, England, Laboratory from SIRIM, Berhad Malaysia

item.title: WinDuct® - Awards & Recognitions as Leader in Quality Fire Rated Duct
item.description: WinDuct® complies to ISO9001:2008 Quality Management System (QMS) to ensure of the best quality and performance. In year 2011, WinDuct® has been awarded with the National Mark of Malaysian Brand by SME Corporation Malaysia, a central coordinating agency to Ministry of International Trade and Industry Malaysia, to recognize the quality, excellence and distinction of WinDuct®.
